command:
if ! [ -x "$(command -v pip)" ]; then
    python3 -m ensurepip || python3 -m ensurepip --user || apt-get install python3-pip
fi

PIP_DISABLE_PIP_VERSION_CHECK=1 python3 -m pip install --quiet --no-warn-script-location '-r requirements.txt'  &&  python3 -m pip install --quiet --no-warn-script-location 'kfp==2.14.2' '--no-deps' 'typing-extensions>=3.7.4,<5; python_version<"3.9"' && "$0" "$@"

import kfp
from kfp import dsl
from kfp.dsl import *
from typing import *

def run_training():
    import subprocess
    import sys
    import os

    # Add src directory to PYTHONPATH
    sys.path.append(os.path.abspath("."))

    # Now run your training script
    subprocess.run(["python", "train.py"], check=True)
